1:
Those who trust in Yahweh are like Mount Zion,\q2 which cannot be shaken or moved out of its place.
\q1
2:
As the hills that surround Jerusalem protect it,\q2 so Yahweh protects us, his people,
\q2 and he will protect us forever.
\q1
3:
Wicked people should not be allowed to rule over the land where righteous people live.\q2 If they did that, those righteous people would think of doing wrong themselves.



\q1
4:
Yahweh, do good things to those who do good things to others\q2 and to those who sincerely obey your commands.
\q1
5:
But when you punish the Israelites who no longer obey you,\q2 you will punish them the same as you punish all the other evildoers.
\q1 I wish that things may go well for people in Israel!
